mapper.select: select @num:=@num+1 as 'count', gantt_list_no as 'ganttListNo', gantt_no as 'ganttNo', user_no as 'userNo', title, worker, start_date as 'startDate', end_date as 'endDate', color from gantt_chart_list as a, (select @num := 0) as b where gantt_no= (select gantt_no from gantt_chart where project_list_no = #{projectListNo});
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gantt_chart_list(gantt_list_no, gantt_no, user_no, title, worker, start_date, end_date, color) VALUES (null, (select gantt_no from gantt_chart where project_list_no = #{projectListNo}), #{userNo}, #{title}, #{worker}, date_add(#{startDate}, interval +1 day), date_add(#{endDate}, interval +1 day), #{color})

INSERT INTO action_chart_list (action_list_no, action_no, gantt_list_no, user_no, action_date, status) VALUES (null, (select action_no from action_chart where project_list_no=#{projectListNo}), #{ganttListNo}, #{userNo}, date_add(#{actionDate}, interval +1 day), #{status})
mapper.select: select a.action_list_no as actionListNo, a.action_no as actionNo, a.gantt_list_no as ganttListNo, user_no as userNo, action_date as actionDate, a.status, b.count, b.color from action_chart_list as a inner join( select @num:=@num+1 as 'count', gantt_list_no as 'ganttListNo', gantt_no as 'ganttNo', user_no as 'userNo', title, worker, start_date as 'startDate', end_date as 'endDate', color from gantt_chart_list as a, (select @num := 0) as b where gantt_no= (select gantt_no from gantt_chart where project_list_no = #{projectListNo})) as b on a.gantt_list_no = b.ganttListNo

select b.count from action_chart_list as a inner join( select @num:=@num+1 as 'count', gantt_list_no as 'ganttListNo', gantt_no as 'ganttNo', user_no as 'userNo', title, worker, start_date as 'startDate', end_date as 'endDate', color from gantt_chart_list as a, (select @num := 0) as b where gantt_no= (select gantt_no from gantt_chart where project_list_no = #{projectListNo})) as b on a.gantt_list_no = b.ganttListNo where action_date = date(now())
